name: Heart of the Swarm Cinematic: Return of the Overmind
shortName: Heart of the Swarm Cinematic: Return of the Overmind
description: Here it is folks, the first real cinematic I've ever made. Taking place in between the third and fourth missions of Heart of the Swarm, this shows the result of the attempt to resurrect the Overmind. Simply start and enjoy!
author: _ForgeUser4468584
